entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:25 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 7:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: WNW 37 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
